Name: Battle Imagine - Mutant Flesh Mountain
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade the Battle Imagine skill of Mutant Meat Mountain - Stunt! Invisible Impact.

Stunt! Invisible Impact
Resonate with the power of Elite Mutant Meat Mountain, charging up to deal Attack Damage in front, the longer the charge, the higher the break resistance efficiency.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade the Battle Imagine skill of Mutant Meat Mountain - Stunt! Invisible Impact.

Stunt! Invisible Impact
Resonate with the power of Elite Mutant Meat Mountain, charging up to deal Attack Damage in front, the longer the charge, the higher the break resistance efficiency.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
